title: After Earth 2013 HDTS LINE Cropped XVID AC3 HQ Hive-CM8
description:
A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

Video: 720x256 @bitrate 1700 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 Line
Sample: Yes included

Sources:
Video: SMY Thx
Audio: Sweet Line from a friend THX

Encode:

Chinese Video was nice just needed fixing brightness,contrast and saturation - fixed
was slightly tilted -- fixed

Had the Line for quite a while but the older videos werent worth it, so i waited.
The audio itself was nice, removed hiss and noise and cleaned it up as usual.

The Chinese Video is different cut and 3 minutes shorter than the us version, so i had to cut out the audio parts i had no video for.
(from hearing the audio its only a longer dialogue between will smith and his son on 15 spots.)

Synced the Line lipsync as usual, got great.

I removed the chinese logo at the beginning and there is one 10sec scene that was shown differently in us cinemas,
so i had only partly audio for it,tried mixing cam audio in, sounded weird so i decided it had to go, hence runtime 20secs shorter
wont be missed at all, was a useless scene anyway.

Decided to do 2 different Versions one cropped the other uncropped so you can choose now

all in all got great and will do me till retail or r5
enjoy
